Package game.elements

Class Board

java.lang.Object
game.elements.Board
All Implemented Interfaces:
Savable
public class Board extends Object implements Savable
This class Board it's used to set a new board.
Author:
Gianmarco Caldaroni.

      public Board(ArrayList<String> lines) throws CharConversionException
      Overload the constructor for BoardTester.
      Parameters:
      lines - represents a particular status of the board.
      Throws:
      CharConversionException - thrown when there is an invalid character in the board.

      Parameters:

    • makeMove

      public void makeMove(Integer playerInput, Piece turn)
      Drop the piece in the board.
      Parameters:
      playerInput - the chosen column.
      turn - a red piece if it's red's player turn, else a yellow piece.

    • checkWinner

      public Player checkWinner(Player redPlayer, Player yellowPlayer, WinningSequence winningSequence)
      Check if there is a winner.
      Parameters:
      redPlayer - the red player.
      yellowPlayer - the yellow player.
      winningSequence - the winning sequence
      Returns:
      winner: the red or yellow player if there are four pieces connected of that color, null otherwise.

    • blink

      public void blink(WinningSequence winningSequence)
      Blink the winning sequence for the animation.
      Parameters:
      winningSequence - the winning sequence.

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      board the board built from the file.
